name: Live or Die: Survival
summary: Live or Die: Zombie Apocalypse Survival plunges you into a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. Combining the best of RPG, survival, shooting, and action genres, this open-world adventure challenges you to survive against all odds. Explore a desolate landscape, gather essential resources, craft and upgrade your equipment, and build an impenetrable base. Complete challenging quests, battle hordes of zombies and powerful mutants, and even build your own motorcycle to traverse the ravaged world. Inspired by survival classics, Live or Die tests your skills and your will to live.
